column5:
I honestly wish I could help you..

The hell you must be experiencing right now must be enormous. Without even knowing you I can tell you've endured alot and probably feel alone.

Try to remember that you arent alone.. given the chance I'm sure most of the people in this group would love to give you a hug and tell you it's all gonna be okay.

You definitely dont deserve to be treated like that and he is wrong about all the nasty things he said.. my pick is that he has his own issues that arent being dealt with.
